body_html:
Unfortunately Bazel doesn't support Android builds on Windows yet -- that seems to be planned for 0.8

In the meantime I'd suggest using the prebuilt libraries or waiting for the upcoming cmake demo build support.
body_text:
Unfortunately Bazel doesn't support Android builds on Windows yet -- that seems to be planned for 0.8
In the meantime I'd suggest using the prebuilt libraries or waiting for the upcoming cmake demo build support.
body:
Unfortunately Bazel doesn't support Android builds on Windows yet -- that seems to be [planned for 0.8](https://bazel.build/roadmap.html)

In the meantime I'd suggest using the [prebuilt libraries](https://ci.tensorflow.org/view/Nightly/job/nightly-android/) or waiting for the upcoming cmake demo build support.
